Describe the contents of an environment

Source: R/get-env.R
get_environment.Rd

Describe the contents of an environment

Usage

get_environment(environment = global_env(), items = NULL)

Arguments

environment

An environment. Optional, defaults to global environment.

items

Optional. A character vector of objects in the environment to describe.

Value

A string describing the environment contents with #> prefixing each object's printed representation.

See Also

  • register_btw_tools() registers this function as a tool for LLMs to call.

  • Other get_*() functions: get_data_frame(), get_environment(), get_installed_packages(), get_package_help(), get_package_vignette(), get_package_vignettes(), get_help_page()
